Royal is a software developer turned Entrepreneur. Previously, CTO of a startup with $7 million ARR, acquired by an edtech unicorn. He was the founding engineer at voice analytics company Deepaffects (acquired by RingCentral) after completing computer science graduation from IIT Bombay.

founders.name: Vedant Agarwala, Founder
founders.description: Engineering leader. Led backend and mobile teams at unicorn tech company Apna Jobs and scaled systems to handle 100 million daily requests. 2x founder, dropped out of college to start quick commerce platform Instano (acqui-hired by MagicTiger).

generated_description:
**CodeParrot AI: A Quick Overview**

Founded in 2022 and backed by Y Combinator’s Winter 2023 batch, CodeParrot AI is an innovative startup hailing from Bengaluru, India. The company’s mission is clear: to help developers build stunning user interfaces (UIs) at lightning speed. 

### What They Do

Originally launched as a developer-first design-to-code tool, CodeParrot AI leverages artificial intelligence to transform design components from Figma files or screenshots into production-ready code. The tool aims to streamline the frontend development process, allowing engineers to focus on more creative tasks instead of getting bogged down in the mundane aspects of coding.

### Key Features
- **Rapid UI Generation:** CodeParrot can produce frontend pages in minutes rather than days, vastly improving efficiency for teams.
- **Tech Stack Compatibility:** The platform works seamlessly with popular technologies like React, Flutter, Angular, and more.
- **Integration with Existing Code:** Developers can integrate themes, components, and libraries from their existing projects, while adhering to their coding standards.

### Customer Base

From startups to Fortune 500 companies, engineers at organizations like Mercedes-Benz, Accenture, and LinkedIn are leveraging CodeParrot to supercharge their UI development. 

### Team
With a nimble team of just two, CodeParrot AI is not only agile but also primed for rapid development and deployment of future enhancements. Brad Flora serves as the Group Partner, guiding the company’s strategic direction.

### Pricing Plans
CodeParrot AI offers flexible pricing, starting from $19 per seat per month for individuals and small teams, scaling up to enterprise solutions with custom themes and an emphasis on data security.

### User Feedback

Feedback from users is overwhelmingly positive. Many developers report a dramatic reduction in UI development time and have hailed the tool as a remarkable productivity booster. Testimonials highlight the efficiency with which CodeParrot converts designs into usable code, allowing teams to innovate rather than iterate.

### Conclusion

CodeParrot AI stands as a prime example of how AI can disrupt traditional workflows in software development. By merging the worlds of design and development, they’re creating powerful tools that cater to the modern developer’s needs. If you’re looking to streamline your UI development process, it’s definitely worth checking out their [website](https://codeparrot.ai/) and testing out their offerings.
